All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Home
    Home activity is the base activity which brings the user to it, when successfully logged in It has a leaderboard button which allows users to check the high score, low score, total scans, etc.
    LeaderboardActivity
    Displays the leaderboard with the option of sorting by the three main stats Does not rank users who are not on the board yet
    LeaderboardItem
    Used for creating the recycler view of the leaderboard
    Location
    Location Activity allows the user to find QR Codes current location it shows a map which can be zoomed in, out based on the lat/long which is feed into The navigation bar is allowed to browse it and switch between different activities
    LoginActivity
    LoginActivity Activity for logging the user into the app Will first check for stored credentials on device Presents user with option to create account or scan a QR code to login Upon successfully doing any of the above moves user to profile screen
    MainActivity
    Main activity
    OwnerActivity  
    PersonalStats
    Displays a user's 4 main personal stats: highest/lowest score, total score, sum scans
    Profile
    Profile opens profile activity allowing user to check their profile browse between activities
    ProfileActivity
    ProfileActivity Activity meant to display user profile also allows setting profile contact info It has QR Code which can be generated to view game status
    QR_Scan
    QR Scan Activity is for scanning the QR code allows user to get the score of the scanned QR code Record the image of the object/location Allows users to get the geo location as Latitude, Longitude and record it Through the navigation bar, the user can browse different activities such as, if on QR can activity, it can switch to home, profile etc.
    QRCode
    This class handles the creation of QR code objects
    QRCollectionActivity
    Handles the user's collection of QR codes (displaying, deleting, adding, etc.)
    RVAdapter
    Adapater for recycler view of leaderboard
    RVAdapter.PlayerViewHolder  
    ScanView
    Scan View Activity opens when scan button is pressed It allows the user to scan a QR code and get a textvalue of it
    ScoreActivity
    This class is used to update a user's stats.
    Search  
    User
    This class represents a users user Contains username, password, contactInfo
